channel.title: Question
channel.description: Does anyone know an extremely quick way of learning around a 1000 word speech. I have tryed just re-reading the lines over and over again but it just takes too long. Thanks =)

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @imafatmess imafatmess
item.description:
@imafatmess wrote:

It's not actually a speech. It's more of the teacher asking questions on two topics, although we have to learn six. We don't know which will be asked about. It goes towards quite a bit of my German GCSE too =(

I'll just try reading and re-reading over and over and over again.

Oh yeah, I have to know it all by tuesday next week...

Read full topic

Ich liebe Deutsch lesen.
